content_index.sheet_name: Have a Healthy Relationship with Family Members

Onboarding.introduction.msg_list: Before we begin the ParentText programme, we must learn to slow down. ğŸ’š
Onboarding.importance.msg_list: Slowing down will help you manage stress and be more able to take care of others and yourself.ğŸŒ±
Onboarding.comic.text.1:
1ï¸âƒ£ *SIT DOWN*

â¸  Find a place where you can sit comfortably.

â­ You can close your eyes if youâ€™d like.
Onboarding.comic.text.2:
2ï¸âƒ£ *LISTEN*

ğŸŒ± Take a deep breath.

ğŸ‘‚ Feel  the air moving in and out of your body.

ğŸ”„ Repeat this 5 times.
Onboarding.comic.text.3:
3ï¸âƒ£ *NOTICE*

âœ¨ Notice how your body feels while you breathe.

ğŸ”µ Notice where you feel tension in your body and try to let it go.
Onboarding.comic.text.4:
4ï¸âƒ£ *OPEN YOUR EYES*

ğŸ‘€ When you are ready, open your eyes.

ğŸ”‘ Notice if you feel any different than when you started this activity.
Onboarding.tips.intro: Try slowing down whenever you feel angry, overwhelmed, stressed or worried. â° Even a few deep breaths or connecting with the ground beneath you can make a difference. You can also slow down with Your Child!
Onboarding.video.message: Letâ€™s slow down, together. â–¶ï¸Press Play
Onboarding.audio.message: Letâ€™s slow down, together. â–¶ï¸Press Play
Onboarding.congratulations.msg_list: Well done! You have learnt how to slow down!

Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.introduction.msg_list:
This skill is about how you and your partner, or other family members such as your childâ€™s grandparents, can treat each other as equals. â­ Family and friends might tell you how a partner, a parent, or a grandparent should act. But men, women, and grandparents all benefit when they talk to each other and make decisions together. 

For example, next time a decision needs to be made, involve your partner and other family members who take care of your child and ask what they think.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.importance.msg_list: Treating each other as equals and making decisions together can have a big impact on how we feel and can help our children feel loved and safe. â­
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.question: Important decisions that impact the whole family or the relationship between family members should only be made by one person.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct: You are right! Communicating and making big decisions together with our partner and other family members is an important part of having a healthy relationship. ğŸ”‘
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect: Incorrect. When making big decisions that impact the whole family or relationship, it is important for family members to practise making decisions together.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.intro: Here is a comic that shows how family members can treat each other as equals and make decisions together:
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.1: {F1_FATHER}: â€œMy dear, you look worried. Whatâ€™s wrong?â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.2:
{F1_MOTHER}: â€œThe stove has not been working very well recently. I think it might be broken.â€

{F1_FATHER}: â€œI noticed this too when I was cooking last week. I wanted to ask you: do you think we should buy a new one?â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.3:
{F1_MOTHER}: â€œBuying a new one would be really expensive. How about we talk about it after dinner, and we can make a decision together?

{F1_FATHER}: â€œThat sounds great. Thank you for cooking dinner, my dear!â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.4:
{F1_FATHER}: â€œItâ€™s great we can talk about this and make this decision together. It makes a lot more sense to try to get it repaired first.â€

{F1_MOTHER}: â€œMe too. I feel a lot better now that we have talked about it together.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.intro: Here are some simple steps that you and your family members can do to treat each other as equals:
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.1.text:
1ï¸âƒ£ *SHARE DECISION MAKING*

ğŸ’¡ Next time you are making a decision, try involving your partner or other family members. 

ğŸ˜ƒ Ask what they think.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.2.text:
2ï¸âƒ£ *INVOLVE YOUR PARTNER*

ğŸ˜£ It can sometimes be hard to remember to involve our partners or other family members in decision making. 

ğŸ”„ If you forget, keep trying! 

â­ Asking for their opinion shows that you care and want them to be involved.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.3.text:
3ï¸âƒ£ *TIMING MAKES A DIFFERENCE*
 
â° If you have a decision to make, bring it up during a time when you and your family members are not too busy, such as early in the morning or later in the evening.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.4.text:
4ï¸âƒ£ *PRACTICE MAKES PERFECT*

â° It can take time to get used to making decisions together. 

ğŸ”„ Give yourself time and keep trying! 

ğŸ˜ƒ Remember that by communicating with your family members, you will both eventually start to feel more comfortable talking and sharing decisions.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.video.message: Hereâ€™s a video message about treating each other as equals.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.audio.message: Hereâ€™s a audio message about treating each other as equals.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.activity: Home Activity! â­ Your home activity is to involve your partner or other family members in a decision you are making today. Can you do it?  â°
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.positive_msg: Well done! Communicating and working together with your family members makes a difference! ğŸ‰
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.negative_msg: It can take time to get used to making decisions together. Give yourself time to adjust. Remember that by communicating with your family members and involving them in decision-making, they will start to feel more comfortable doing so too. â­ Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.congratulations.msg_list: Well done, you have completed the first step to having a healthy relationship with your partner and other family members! You are one step closer towards your goal of â€œHave a Healthy Relationship with my Family Membersâ€ ğŸ‰

Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.module_name: Being a Supportive Family Memberand Parent
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.introduction.msg_list: This skill is about becoming a confident and supportive family member as a parent. ğŸ’š
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.importance.msg_list: When mothers and fathers are both engaged in parenting their children, everyone benefits, including the children. ğŸ˜ƒ
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.question: It is only the role of the mother and not the father to parent a child.ğŸ’š
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct: You are right! Parenting is not only the role of a mother - fathers play an important part too! When both mothers and fathers are involved in parenting their children everyone benefits! ğŸŒ·
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect: Incorrect. Parenting is not only the role of a mother - fathers play an important part too! When both mothers and fathers are involved in parenting their children everyone benefits! ğŸŒ·
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.intro: Here is a comic that shows how you can be a supportive family member and involved parent:
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.1: Father: â€œGood job, {F1_SON_18}! You are reading very well!â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.2: Mother: â€œThe weather today is so nice. It is a shame I have not had time to go outside for a walk.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.3: Father: â€œIf you would like to get some fresh air and exercise, my dear, I can continue helping the children with their homework while you go for your afternoon walk.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.4:
Mother: â€œThat would be wonderful, my love! Thank you for being so supportive.â€

Father: â€œOf course! It is fun to help the children with their reading practice! They are doing so well.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.intro: Here are some simple ways you can become a more confident and supportive family member AND parent.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.1.text:
1ï¸âƒ£ *SHOW APPRECIATION*

âš½ Show your partner that you appreciate it when they spend quality time with your children.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.2.text:
2ï¸âƒ£ *WORK TOGETHER*

ğŸ˜ƒ Unsure how to work together with your partner? Ask them! 

âœ… By asking, you show that you care and want to be involved!
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.3.text:
3ï¸âƒ£ *LEND A HAND*

ğŸ‘‹It can sometimes be difficult to remember to ask your partner if they need help. 

ğŸ’¡ Once you start asking, they may realise you want to be more involved and begin asking for your help on their own.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.4.text:
4ï¸âƒ£ *ASK FOR HELP*

ğŸ˜’ It can be hard to ask for help. Sometimes we expect our partners to know we need help even if we donâ€™t ask them. 

â­Once you start asking, they will likely start offering to help more in the future! 

ğŸ’š Remember to thank your partner!
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.video.message: Hereâ€™s a video message about being a supportive family member and parent.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.audio.message: Hereâ€™s a audio message about being a supportive family member and parent.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.activity: Home activity! â­ Try doing childcare or housework together with your partner. Do you have time to do it today?
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.negative_msg: Sometimes it can be hard to find time during the day. Can you think of a time when youâ€™re less busy? For example, maybe it is easier to do housework together later in the evening when some of the children have gone to sleep. Try to see what works for you! â­ Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.congratulations.msg_list: Well done, you have completed the second step to having a healthy relationship with your family member! You are one step closer towards your goal of â€œHave a Healthy Relationship with my family memberâ€ ğŸ‰

Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.introduction.msg_list: This skill is about sharing family responsibilities between you and your family members. ğŸ‘‹
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.importance.msg_list: Sharing family responsibilities with your family members can help make life less stressful and improve your relationship! ğŸ’š
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.question: Sharing family responsibilities is not important as long as the housework gets done.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct: You are right! Sharing the workload is important to make sure things are equal and benefits the whole family! Establishing a routine around caregiving or housework tasks can sometimes be helpful. This also lets you talk to your family members about how to share the workload.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect: Incorrect. Sharing the workload is important to make sure things are equal and benefits the whole family! Establishing a routine around caregiving or housework tasks can sometimes be helpful. This also lets you talk to your family members  about how to share the workload.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.intro: Here is a comic that shows how you can share family responsibilities.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.1: {F1_DAUGHTER_13}: â€œWow, there are so many clothes in here!â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.2:
Mother: â€œYouâ€™re right, {F1_DAUGHTER_13}, there is quite a lot to do.â€

Father: â€œIf we do it together it will take less time!â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.3: Mother: â€œDoing tasks together is also funâ€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.4: Father: â€œThank you, my love. Sharing the workload makes it less stressful.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.intro: Here are some simple ways you can start sharing family responsibilities with your partner
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.1.text:
1ï¸âƒ£ *CREATE A ROUTINE!* 

â° This can be hard to remember! Establishing a routine around caregiving or housework tasks can sometimes be helpful. 

ğŸ˜ƒ This also lets you talk to your family members about how to share the workload.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.2.text:
2ï¸âƒ£ *TALK ABOUT THE WORKLOAD WITH YOUR PARTNER*

ğŸ˜ƒ Talking with your family members about how you can share family responsibilities helps both of you understand each other better. 

ğŸ’› It also shows that you care!
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.3.text:
3ï¸âƒ£ *ASK FOR HELP*

ğŸ˜’ It can be hard to remember to ask for help. 

ğŸŒ· Be kind to yourself if you forget to ask and try again another time. 

â­ Asking for help and sharing family responsibilities benefits the whole family!
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.video.message: Hereâ€™s a video message about sharing family responsibilities.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.audio.message: Hereâ€™s a audio message about sharing family responsibilities.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.activity: Home Activity! â­ Invite your family members to discuss how you can share family responsibilities more evenly at home! Do you have time to do it today?
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.positive_msg: Excellent job! Sharing the workload benefits the whole family. You are a star! ğŸ‰
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.negative_msg: Trying something new can be hard! To make it easier, ask your family members if you can do housework tasks the first few times. Soon youâ€™ll feel more confident doing it on your own! â­ Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.congratulations.msg_list: Well done, you have completed the third step to having a healthy relationship with your family members! You are one step closer towards your goal of â€œHave a Healthy Relationship with my family membersâ€ ğŸ‰

Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.introduction.msg_list: This skill is about resolving conflict peacefully between you and your partner, as well as other family members such as your childâ€™s grandparents. ğŸ’š
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.importance.msg_list: All adults have disagreements sometimes. But fighting is not an effective way to solve issues. Learning to respond in a calmer way when experiencing disagreements with your family members can help you create a more peaceful home.ğŸŒ·
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.question: When facing a disagreement, taking a pause before responding can help us stay calm and respond better.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct: Thatâ€™s correct! It can be really hard to stay calm when weâ€™re having a disagreement with others. So taking a pause, such as by taking a couple of deep breaths, can be a useful way to help us to respond better.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect: Thatâ€™s incorrect. Since it can be really hard to stay calm when weâ€™re having a disagreement with others, taking a pause, such as by taking a couple of deep breaths, can be a useful way to help us to respond better.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.intro: Here is a comic that shows how you can resolve conflict peacefully.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.1:
{F1_DAUGHTER_13}: Look, it is raining!

Mother: Oh no! We left the laundry outside!
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.2:
Father: â€œI thought you said you would bring in the laundry today?â€

Mother: â€œNo, I was busy cooking dinner! You told me you would take care of it! How could you forget? Now all the laundry is wet!â€

Father: â€œIâ€™m really sorry. It was a mistake!â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.3: Mother (thinking): I canâ€™t believe he forgot! But everyone can make mistakes. Take a deep breathâ€¦
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.4:
Mother: â€œIâ€™m sorry if I sounded upset. I just got stressed because I have had a long day.â€

Father: â€œI am sorry that I forgot the laundry. I know you have had a long day. I will take care of it now.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.intro: Here are some tips you can try to resolve conflicts with your family members in a peaceful way.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.1.text:
1ï¸âƒ£ *COUNT TO 10*

ğŸ˜£ It can sometimes be really hard to stay calm when weâ€™re having a disagreement with others. 

ğŸ”Ÿ Try to think of something that you can do that might help, like taking a couple deep breaths or counting to ten.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.2.text:
2ï¸âƒ£ *SLOW DOWN*

â¸ On the first day of ParentText, you learned to close your eyes, breathe deep, and slow down. 

ğŸ˜ƒ Slow down before responding can help us stay calm and respond better a little later. 

ğŸŒ· When you feel yourself getting angry, try slowing down. You can do this!
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.3.text:
3ï¸âƒ£ *WALK AWAY IF NECESSARY*

ğŸ˜£ Sometimes others respond to us negatively when weâ€™re having a disagreement.

â— In these situations, especially if you feel fearful or threatened, it may be best to walk away for a bit until everyone has calmed down.
;
Remember, if you need help in a crisis, you can type {HELP} in ParentText to receive a list of community resources where you may find support.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.video.message: Hereâ€™s a video message about resolving conflicts peacefully.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.audio.message: Hereâ€™s a audio message about resolving conflicts peacefully.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.activity: Home Activity! â­ Todayâ€™s home activity is to practise slowing down. Do you have time to practise slowing down today?
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.positive_msg: Good job! Slowing down and staying calm is a great way to reduce conflicts.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.negative_msg: It can be really hard to stay calm when weâ€™re having a disagreement with others. Try to think of something that you can do that might help like taking a couple deep breaths. Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.congratulations.msg_list: Well done, you have completed the fourth step to having a healthy relationship with your partner! You are one step closer towards your goal of â€œHave a Healthy Relationship with my family membersâ€ ğŸ‰

Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.module_name: Listening and Talking to Each Other
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.introduction.msg_list: This skill is about how you and your partner, as well as other family members such as your childâ€™â€™s grandparents, can listen and talk to each other in a positive way. ğŸ’™
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.importance.msg_list:
Listening and talking to those around us are key to a more peaceful home. ğŸ‘‚

Talking to your family members about issues before they become bigger problems can help avoid arguments from building up. ğŸ’›
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.question: Talking to and listening to your family members can help prevent conflict
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_correct: Thatâ€™s correct! Sharing how we feel and talking about difficulties weâ€™re facing makes the family more united and harmonious! When you listen and talk to your family members you can support each other more and help reduce conflict!
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.quiz.content.1.feedback_incorrect: Thatâ€™s incorrect. Sharing how we feel and talking about difficulties weâ€™re facing makes the family more united and harmonious! When you listen and talk to your family members you can support each other more and help reduce conflict!
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.intro: Here is a comic that shows how family members can listen and talk to each other in a supportive and loving way.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.1:
Mother: â€œAre you okay, my love? You look tired.â€

Father: â€œI didnâ€™t sleep well last night and so I am feeling quite tired.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.2:
Mother: â€œI am sorry to hear that, {F1_FATHER}. Is there anything I can do to help?â€

Father: â€œI might try and get an earlier rest this evening.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.3: Mother: â€œI can take over the childrenâ€™s bedtime routine after dinner tonight, so that you can get some extra rest.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.comic.text.4: Father: â€œThat would be lovely. Thank you so much, my dear.â€
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.intro: Here are some tips on how you and your partner can listen and talk with each other in a supportive and loving way:
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.1.text:
1ï¸âƒ£ *SHARE HOW YOU FEEL*

ğŸ† Sharing how we feel and talking about the difficulties weâ€™re facing is a sign of strength and can make the family more united and harmonious! 

ğŸ’š By sharing emotions you can better understand and support each other.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.2.text:
2ï¸âƒ£ *YOU CHOOSE WHAT YOU SHARE*

ğŸ˜ƒ Sharing your challenges with your family members is about making them more aware of how you are feeling. 

â­ Remember, you decide how much you share. You can always choose to share more at a later time.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.3.text:
3ï¸âƒ£ *BE KIND TO YOURSELF*

ğŸ˜£ Starting something new can be difficult. 

â° Give yourself and others time to get used to it.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.tips.message.4.text:
4ï¸âƒ£ *CHOOSE A TIME WHEN YOU FEEL COMFORTABLE*

ğŸ’š Itâ€™s okay if you don't always want to share your emotions. 

ğŸŒ· You can choose to share how youâ€™re feeling at a later time once you feel calmer.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.video.message: Hereâ€™s a video message about listening and talking to each other.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.audio.message: Hereâ€™s a audio message about listening and talking to each other.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.activity: Home Activity! â­ Try setting aside some time to talk to your family members about your feelings and any difficulties youâ€™re facing. Do you have time to do it today?
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.positive_msg: Good for you! Talking about challenges and our emotions can be hard. You are doing great! ğŸ‰
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.home_activity.negative_msg: Talking about our feelings and challenges weâ€™re facing can help others understand and support you better. Emotions and challenges are a part of life, and learning how to handle these, can help make life less stressful. Remember you can refer back to this content in the Main Menu.
Have a Healthy Relationship with Family.congratulations.msg_list: Well done, you have completed the fifth step to having a healthy relationship with your family members! ğŸ‰
